wordGroup: no fewer than 不少于；不低于；多达

sentences.en: We need fewer organizers and more doers.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的是少些组织者，多些实干者。

sentences.en: There seem to be fewer tourists around this year.
sentences.cn: 今年来访的旅游者似乎少了。

sentences.en: Fewer workers are needed to solder circuit boards.
sentences.cn: 焊接电路板需要较少的工人。
